text: Cumia simonis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Colubrariidae. ==Description== The shell size varies between 15 mm and 20 mm ==Distribution== This species is found in the Indian Ocean off Madagascar. ==References== * Bozzetti, L., 2004. Fusus simonis sp. n. (Gastropoda, Buccinidae) dal Madagascar meridionale. Malacologia Mostra Mondiale 42: 3-4 ==External links== * Category:Colubrariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2004
title: Cumia simonis
